availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred L. Hyatt (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ellen Hill Hyatt in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on April 9, 1840. Father of Ashford W. Hyatt, Louisa Hyatt, John M. Hyatt, Matilda Hyatt, William D. Hyatt, Robert Hyatt, Morill Hyatt, Mary Hyatt, and Harriet Hyatt. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 443B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 703.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film 000252392, p. 58.
